resources.string: Create ringtones, notifications, and loops in a few taps.
Waveform not available for this file
Import audio to preview the waveform.
Adjust playback/conversion speed from 0.1x up to 4x.
Use device settings for light/dark mode.
Switch between dark and light themes.
Leave feedback on the Play Store listing.
Tap Import audio to pick a clip from your device.
Drag the range handles to select the part you want. Use Listen to preview.
Choose format, quality, and speed, then tap Trim audio to generate a new file.
Adjust the theme, review legal info, and find help or feedback options anytime.
Join the Audio Cutter community to share tips, request features, and connect with other creators. We will add a public link soon. In the meantime, you can leave feedback on the Play Store listing.

Audio Cutter processes your audio on your device to trim and export clips. We do not upload your audio files to our servers. Data access: audio files you choose to import; storage permissions required for import and export. Third-party services: AdMob may collect device identifiers for advertising and analytics; review the Google privacy policy for details. Your choices: you can revoke permissions in Android settings. Contact: for questions, email %1$s.

Audio Cutter processes your audio on your device to trim and export clips. We do not upload your audio files to our servers. Data access: audio files you choose to import; storage permissions required for import and export. Third-party services: AdMob may collect device identifiers for advertising and analytics; review the Google privacy policy for details. Your choices: you can revoke permissions in Android settings. Contact: leave feedback on the Play Store listing.

By using Audio Cutter, you agree to use the app responsibly and only with audio you have rights to edit. The app is provided "as is" without warranties. We are not liable for damages resulting from misuse or data loss. You are responsible for: ensuring you have permission to edit and export audio; backing up important files before editing. We may update these terms with new app versions.

Quick tips: import audio from your device to begin; drag the handles to choose the start and end points; use Listen to preview before trimming; pick output format and quality, then tap Trim audio. Need help? Use Send feedback to contact support; check for updates in the store for new features.

Quick tips: import audio from your device to begin; drag the handles to choose the start and end points; use Listen to preview before trimming; pick output format and quality, then tap Trim audio. Need help? Use Send feedback to leave a Play Store review; check for updates in the store for new features.
